org.red5.classloading

Class QuartzClassLoadHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.red5.classloading.QuartzClassLoadHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.quartz.spi.ClassLoadHelper

    public class QuartzClassLoadHelper
extends Object
implements org.quartz.spi.ClassLoadHelper
    A ClassLoadHelper that determines the correct class loader to use for a scheduler.
    Author:
    Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    ClassLoadHelper

      Finds a resource with a given name.
      void initialize()
      Called to give the ClassLoadHelper a chance to initialize itself, including the opportunity to "steal" the class loader off of the calling thread, which is the thread that is initializing Quartz.
      Class<?> loadClass(String name)
      Return the class with the given name.

        Called to give the ClassLoadHelper a chance to initialize itself, including the opportunity to "steal" the class loader off of the calling thread, which is the thread that is initializing Quartz.

        public URL getResource(String name)
